polish 6 danish 7 norwegian 8 **the rust & rhythm scarf is a fun straight scarf which combines a 3 x 3 garter stitch rib with the intarsia technique to create bold and graphical shapes ** you follow a simple 2-row repeat pattern to create the garter stitch rib while at the same time following a colour chart for the intarsia shapes additionally the pattern includes step-by-step instructions for the intarsia joins and a trick to hide any floats that occur when a motif changes shape and you need to carry the yarn backwards or forwards **measurements ** width 22 cm / 8 75 length 196 cm / 77 25
